oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Production of White Cabbage Control of Quality and Safety in Organic Production Chains
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Brandt, Kirsten
L端ck, Lorna
Wyss, Gabriela
Velimirov, Alberta
Torjusen, Hanne
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Food security, food quality and human health
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This leaflet provides a practical overview for producers and others involved in white cabbage production and packaging, of what can be done at these steps to improve the quality and safety of organi-cally produced cabbage, in addition to certification and general food safety requirements. Other leaflets cover production of other commodities and separate leaflets aim at consumers and retailers.

Organic HACCP, no. Nr.11. Forschungsinstitut f端r biologischen Landbau, CH-5070 Frick; University of Newcastle, UK-NE1 7RU,Newcastle upon Tyne. [Unpublished]
